text: André Costa (born 21 August 1976) is a Brazilian rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Brazil Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Porto Alegre
title: André Costa (rower)
